thread.title: Wife of Hedge-Fund Titan Pays $60 Million for Manhattan Apartment

author: Katherine Clarke
title: Wife of Hedge-Fund Titan Pays $60 Million for Manhattan Apartment
text:
Caryl Englander, the wife of billionaire hedge-fund titan Israel Englander, is the buyer of a $60.083 million apartment at 432 Park Avenue, the worldâ€™s tallest residential tower, according to two people familiar with the deal. The deal was one of the priciest to close in Manhattan last year, public records show.
Ms. Englander, 64, purchased the apartment in a trust. She closed on the transaction in late December, property records show.
